thread.title: Shawcor Announces Conference Call/Webcast to Discuss Fourth Quarter and Year End 2017 Results Friday, March 2, 2018 at 10:00AM ET

author: cnbc.com
title: Shawcor Announces Conference Call/Webcast to Discuss Fourth Quarter and Year End 2017 Results Friday, March 2, 2018 at 10:00AM ET
text:
TORONTO, Feb. 20, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Shawcor Ltd. (TSX:SCL) announced today that it expects to report its financial results for the period ended December 31 st , 2017 on Thursday, March 1, 2018, after the close of trading on the TSX.
A conference call/webcast to discuss these results will be held on Friday, March 2, 2018 at 10:00am ET.
Please visit the Shawcor Investor Centre website at shawcor.com or use the following link http://investors.shawcor.com/event for further details.
Gaston Tano
Senior Vice President, Finance and CFO
Telephone: 416.744.5539
Email: gaston.tano@shawcor.com
shawcor.com
Source: Shawcor Ltd.
